<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get location address"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/{LocationId}/address"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the physical address associated with a specific location. Returns street address, city, state, ZIP code, country, and geographic coordinates (latitude/longitude).

**Prerequisites**
1. **LocationId** - Obtain via [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2) and extract `Items[].LocationId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List locations: [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2) â†’ extract target `LocationId`.
2. Call this endpoint: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/\{LocationId\}/address](/docs/api/locations/get-location-address-v-2).
3. Use returned coordinates for mapping integration or address display.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [GET /api/v2.0/locations/\{LocationId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-location-by-id-v-2) - Get complete location record with address included
- [GET /api/v2.0/locations/address/\{AddressId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-address-by-id-v-2) - Get address directly by AddressId

**Authentication:** Requires valid bearer token.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"LocationId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMyLocationsV2","endpoint":"GET /api/v2.0/locations","responseField":"Items[].LocationId"},"description":"UUID of the location. >
  
</ParamsDetails>
